text: Hi all. Can someone fill me in in 140 characters on the purpose of this group vs prev group and maybe benefits of this vs using IRC etc? Ta!
OK, thanks H. Security issues were about who was on the list then? Never quite know who you’re dealing with online I guess. I don’t, anyway!

Hmm, this is complicated, not least cos it’s not just artist [redacted, third party information] but also ‘the man behind the idea’ [redacted, third party information] http://anythingtosay.com/content/
and [redacted, third party information] statement on the website (& a later short description) refers to “Bradley Chelsea Manning” which is not the best.
They probably wanted to avoid the issue being diverted off into trans-politics – ie Manning is in jail for the leaks not for being trans…
but unless there’s some acknowledgement, that’s going to happen anyway, thanks to [redacted, third party information] and suchlike.
Using “Chelsea (formerly known as Bradley) Manning” would be improvement. I think all the media i/vs with artist he’s referred to Brad & he.
Because I’ve only seen a few interviews and those referred to Bradley and he. Don’t have TV, don’t watch a lot of vid of news reports
but hope I’m wrong! It’s a big and ongoing problem. Can’t even start having a conversation about Manning’s situation without getting into..
…the trans issues immediately. It’s a societal problem, how we place so much importance on gender. I just do what I can with it as it is.
Gender identity politics is a nightmare. & a gift to the state, unfortunately.
There’s no liberation where the fight’s ended up: now we’ve ‘the cotton ceiling’ where blokes who say they feel like they’re women…
…possibly only part time, complain that lesbians won’t have sex with them!
Meantime, many men are now afraid to enter social centres around UK for fear of being attacked for their behaviour
Yeah, a gender neutral pronoun would be v helpful.
But we’re stuck with centuries of patriarchy too. The important thing is to build alliances between all those who are oppressed, not divide
Indeed.
That statement is helpful (is that posted by Vaughan Smith?) but I can’t see anything like it on http://anythingtosay.com
‘The prisoner’ can work but you can’t write long pieces or talk to people on the street for long in that vein. Also, in my experience…
…it’s important to clarify Chelsea/Bradley – you have to do it – or people think there are more than one person. Happened loads of times
I think it’s easy to forget when you know the story but many ppl simply don’t, or only sketchiest details
Sarcasm doesn’t travel easily on twitter! Or I’m slow! :o)
“The sculpture will show Chelsea Manning at the time when the facts took place. This is also motivated by the fact that the artist could not
get enough portraits of her actual look to make a realistic portrait. All we are doing is to try and keep alive the public interest on this
story. The story of three courageous persons. One women and two men.” https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1856732911/anything-to-say-a-public-art-project-for-freedom/description
But the 2nd sentence is bullshit. ‘Actual look’ would be meaningless in the context of this sculpture.
Yeah, they could really do with the approval of CM to quote to detractors.
Hi Emmy, glad this was worth the trip to Brighton. If show is good, maybe we should put dates/links on wiseup calendar?
Killian is from Dublin where there’s lots of support. I’ve emailed our Irish list – includes actors/musicians who may know him already…
…or can make contact. Donal O’Kelly will be at Edinburgh Fringe too. Good to build links.
Well, at least we don’t have to go through that thing of people becoming re-disillusioned with Labour all over again…
…and the Tories on their own get to take full responsibility and blame for what they do…
…and there are (hopefully) still a few libertarian Tories to cause Cameron some problems.
Is there a link to share that references the dissenting opinion in Supreme court?
Can this departure from normal process be appealed, or is there nowhere to go with it?

Anyone know about this UK whistleblower? – can only find this one opinion piece: http://www.heraldscotland.com/comment/sunday-herald-view/why-this-whistleblowers-warnings-should-spell-the-death-knell-for-trident.126268713
Ah, he’s commented here:
http://www.youblisher.com/p/1138795-William/
working covertly to eliminate the biggest threat to the UK for about a year. My real intentions along with more than enough information to
eliminate the Trident programme are contained in a report that was released on the 05-05-15. Almost all of my email accounts have been …
blocked and I’m in hide out in a foreign country; I might be arrested or killed before the public can read the report. I don’t know how many
laws I’ve broken along the way; I doubt men live long enough to serve the sentence they’ll give me. Anyone who reads it will understand:
my information comes from prefect sources, I have no reason to lie and they will understand if change isn’t made a nuclear catastrophe
almost certainly will happen! My ID and photos are in the report, it will break news soon, but no media outlet will publish the full report
because it contains TS information. I have sacrificed everything please help me end this world order of fear!
end quote. Link to comment: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dN2l5KX0EbY
Sounds like he needs help. Ideas? Will forward the new WL submission link. @wikileaks
Oh, report seems to be already on this link: http://www.youblisher.com/p/1138795-William/
Thanks for the SNP list Emmy! Just about to use it for the above and for this: http://wp.me/p54cDs-oZ
…if I can work out how to use it. Can I send one message that will go to all on the list? Or do I have to tweet one by one?
Oh, they’re for reading tweets only? I’ll have to send messages one by one then I guess. That’s not nearly so attractive! :o(
I presume it must have done checks to run it as front page. I haven’t read Herald article, only editorial. Full info https://indymedia.org.uk/en/2015/05/520573.html
He says he intends to hand himself in to police.

Now published online: http://www.heraldscotland.com/news/home-news/trident-whistleblower-says-nuclear-submarimes-are-insecure-unsafe-and-a-disaster-wait.1431860917http://www.robedwards.com/2015/05/trident-is-a-disaster-waiting-to-happen-says-nuclear-whistleblower.html
Hey WL & all – this is getting a bit personal. Hope no one’s saying Emmy’s lovely face is creepy! :o) FWIW I thought the eye icon was fine.
I’m working on a rush McNeilly/Trident flyer for tomorrow & Mon. Will share a generic version later in case anyone else can use.
Hey, thanks, but I’ve done what I need for tomorrow now., if I can get it to save as a pdf on old laptop where my very old dtp prog is…
…but I’m sure there’s a need for solidarity flyers people can print.
…properly designed, like! Did I imagine that you’re based in uk at present?
Yeah, sure it will be excellent.
I’ve just posted this as a page on wise up. At present it’s not linked to a post… William McNeilly
It’s got my hasty d-i-y flyer, which is also here: https://wiseupforbradleymanning.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/flyer-may-2015-general.pdf
Use of ‘neither confirm nor deny’ is v suspect. eg in spycops case https://www.indymedia.org.uk/en/2014/07/517150.html
… in court the evidence that undercover cop was an undercover cop, while still refusing to confirm that he was one.
More: http://campaignopposingpolicesurveillance.com/2015/03/26/police-concede-marco-jacobs-was-spycop/
I suppose we only have to look to Ireland to see just how low Brits will stoop to hinder independence. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hYF5_z3zmPw&feature=youtu.be
This from Craig Murray on the ST Snowden story: https://www.craigmurray.org.uk/archives/2015/06/five-reasons-the-mi6-story-is-a-lie/
Emmy – re Tom Coburg, he’s just a guy with a blog afaics. He did flaky post abt McNeilly info a while back, I commented & he removed it.
Communicated with me about it – no issues – thanked me for alerting him.
First tweet against me since armed forces day tweets yesterday. I expect more. 77th Brigade? https://twitter.com/RoughJustice4
hi jenny. that sounds bad. they decided what’s wrong yet?
Any update on situation with police build-up around the embassy since the WL tweet?
